alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 11:27AM CST until February 07 at 1:31AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. .Well above normal rainfall over the last few weeks has resulted in significant rises on the Ohio River. The river at Olmsted is forecast the rise above flood stage Thursday, cresting early Saturday a foot and a half above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY, FEBRUARY 07... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Wednesday, February 07. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 32.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 36 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Thursday morning to a crest of 37.5 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday, February 06. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/pah.
